title: (08360) Canet de Mar - 2 Carrer Drassanes de Pla
title_short: (08360) Canet de Mar - 2 Carrer Drassanes de Pla
description: Free parking near the sea with water views.

title: (08360) Canet de Mar - 34 Passeig Nostra Senyora Misericòrdia
title_short: (08360) Canet de Mar - 34 Passeig Nostra Senyora Misericòrdia
description: Spot in height next to a church (which does not ring). Very calm. A few young people in the evening but very discreet. A few dog walkers. We spent one night there with no problem.

title: (08360) Canet de Mar - 41 Passeig Misericòrdia
description: Drinking fountain with high flow

name: Càmping Victòria
title: (08360) Càmping Victòria
description: Warm campsite, the staff is friendly, the camper pitches are removed from the center of the campsite with reserved access, the toilets are nearby for the pitches, the restaurant is not bad either, it's up to you

name: Càmping Costa Dorada
title: (08360) Càmping Costa Dorada
description: Small and very familiar campsite, suitable for a camper van, the owner Gemma has helped us with all possible questions. Two adults, who rested and two children who did not stop bathing in the pool, in accordance with the new coronavirus measures. Clean sinks and clean showers. We will repeat on the safe route. From one night, let's go to be two because of the tranquility that was breathed.Two minutes from Tot Camping Canet physical store ,,, change the auxiliary battery that was failing me and continue the route super happy

name: Camping Globo Barcelona
title: (08360) Camping Globo Barcelona
description:
Canet de Mar, 32 Carrer de les Drassanes del Pla.
 1st category, very clean, generous pitches, low price close to Barcelona compared to prices in the area, French speaking staff. beautiful swimming pool supervised by lifeguard, surveillance of the campsite by security guard, quiet place.

address.street: 32 Carrer de les Drassanes del Pla

name: Camping Marcos
title: (08350) Camping Marcos
description: Clean and well maintained family run campsite.

name: Càmping El Toro Azul
title: (08360) Càmping El Toro Azul
description:
Canet de Mar, 3 N-2.
El Toro Azul family campsite. At the foot of the beach, 1 km walk from the train to reach Barcelona.

title: (08350) Arenys de Mar - 33B Avinguda del Portinyol
title_short: (08350) Arenys de Mar - 33B Avinguda del Portinyol
description: Beautiful place overlooking the port of Arenys de Mar. In the middle of an urbanization but with incredible views of the sea. Less than 1 km from all services for ac.

title: (08395) Sant Pol de Mar - Carrer Bonavista
title_short: (08395) Sant Pol de Mar - Carrer Bonavista
description: Nice places to take a break or spend a night. With access to the beach less than 50 m walk that goes under the national. (See the pictures). We spent one night on this car park and it's ok, just the national passing by. Especially practical if you have a large vehicle.

title: (08360) Canet de Mar -
description:
Nice place in the middle of the pines, magnificent view, a little passage of walkers in the morning, but otherwise the place is very quiet !!
Attention, a high car is highly recommended (our Toyota Rav4 was perfect for climbing the steep and bumpy paths)

title: (08360) Canet de Mar - Camí de Pedracastell
title_short: (08360) Canet de Mar - Camí de Pedracastell
description: Mirador de la Creu, ideal place after a day spent on the beach and a night spent in the forest in silence. During the day, there are movements of cars, motorcycles and people coming to walk. Without services. Driving skills are required to access the track. Steep slope of the earth. Better 4x4. I climbed the wheel with the Kangoo several times.

title: (08359) Canet de Mar - Camí de Pedracastell
title_short: (08359) Canet de Mar - Camí de Pedracastell
description: A flat place in the woods next to a forest track. Quiet, shady place to spend the night after a day at the beach. In the morning someone passes by doing sports. It is recommended to access with a slightly elevated car. We agreed with a wolksvagen. Road not recommended for motorhomes and low cars.

title: (08350) Arenys de Mar - 48 Riera del Pare Fita
title_short: (08350) Arenys de Mar - 48 Riera del Pare Fita
description: It is the end of a street in the Arenys de Munt urbanization, you can sleep peacefully, there is shade and silence

name: Camping la Maresma
title: (08395) Camping la Maresma
description: Small campsite just 800m from the beach

title: (08395) Sant Pol de Mar - 12 Carrer Sant Galderic
title_short: (08395) Sant Pol de Mar - 12 Carrer Sant Galderic
description: Service station with free water tap available between the vacuum cleaners. Really great…

title: (08395) Sant Pol de Mar - 33 Carrer del Gers
title_short: (08395) Sant Pol de Mar - 33 Carrer del Gers
description: Free sand parking in front of a company (industrial area next to a water court). Ideal to spend a night in the calm and the freshness of the trees (shade accessible by motorhome). Attention, the parking fills in the early morning hours of employees' vehicles. No service.

title: (08395) Sant Pol de Mar - 31 BV-5128
description: Parking next to a soccer field. Free weekends and holidays. We slept two nights with no problem. No  prohibition sign. 5 min walk from the beach

title: (08395) Sant Pol de Mar - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08395) Sant Pol de Mar - Unnamed Road
description:
Free water point.
Good parking facilities around.

title: (08358) Arenys de Munt - 69 Carrer Batlle Trias
title_short: (08358) Arenys de Munt - 69 Carrer Batlle Trias
description: Battery parking near the park and lake of Jalpi

title: (08358) Arenys de Munt - 5 C-61
description: Larger gravel parking lot with no height limit and relatively flat overall. The street next door can be heard too clearly. Day and night camping is allowed at this location according to local police.

title: (08396) Sant Cebrià de Vallalta - 16 Carrer Miquel Martí i Pol
title_short: (08396) Sant Cebrià de Vallalta - 16 Carrer Miquel Martí i Pol
description: Great esplanade in the same town next to the sports center

title: (08396) Sant Cebrià de Vallalta - 8 Carrer Ausias March
title_short: (08396) Sant Cebrià de Vallalta - 8 Carrer Ausias March
description: A good place to spend the day and spend the night. Sunny, quiet and in the same town. Land parking of the sports center.

title: (08350) Arenys de Mar - 1 Carrer Rial Llarg
title_short: (08350) Arenys de Mar - 1 Carrer Rial Llarg
description: Reasonable size parking area near McDonald’s with bars and restaurants supermarkets petrol stations and is generally quiet with a view of the sea

title: (08358) Arenys de Munt - 19 Carrer Rial de Can Bellsolell
title_short: (08358) Arenys de Munt - 19 Carrer Rial de Can Bellsolell
description: Parking in earth, without slope, day and night, free. On one side there is no time limit and in the other, you have to put a ticket but without paying

title: (08396) Sant Pol de Mar - Camí de Can Patxoca
title_short: (08396) Sant Pol de Mar - Camí de Can Patxoca
description: Dirt road of little traffic of people. Quiet area a few minutes from paved road.

title: (08359) Sant Iscle de Vallalta - 5 Carrer de la Generalitat
title_short: (08359) Sant Iscle de Vallalta - 5 Carrer de la Generalitat
description: Free land parquing next to a school, with a nice "terrace" with views of part of the town and its mountains that surround it. We spent a Saturday afternoon and night without problems, there was no more ac, only a tourist and us. Very calm and pleasant atmosphere. Without services, but perfect for overnight. Half of the terrain is leveled, the other half with a sensitive slope. Few places for ac. There is a water fountain nearby. Access to the town and its shops walking, very close. Beach a few kms, 15 minutes approx by car.

title: (08359) Sant Iscle de Vallalta - 4 Camí de Can Preses
title_short: (08359) Sant Iscle de Vallalta - 4 Camí de Can Preses
description: Esplanade next to the municipal sports hall. Skating rink, pin pon, picnic tables and swings

title: (08358) Arenys de Munt - Unnamed Road
description: It is next to the road, it is not very level, but there is shade and no one bothers you. It is not for camping, but to rest for a while, yes.

name: CAMPING ROCA GROSSA & BUNGALOW
title: (08370) CAMPING ROCA GROSSA & BUNGALOW
description: Camping Roca Grossa is a terraced campsite, a small train takes you up and down the campsite. It has a restaurant, grocery, swimming pool, tennis, toilets. Plot of size with more or less seen on the sea. Access to the sea (small cove with small pebble and not sand) is made by bridges to cross road and train. pay wifi

title: (08370) Calella - N-II
description: Viewpoint of Platja de Roca Grossa, quiet place with a magnificent view of the sea. Night prohibited on the coast. Camping prohibited, please do not unpack anything.

name: Càmping Bonavista
title: (08395) Càmping Bonavista
description: Calella, Carrer de Sant Jaume. Campsite Bonavista. Family campsite. Lots of trees, close to the sea, easy access by road. Very nice staff and welcome. We will definitely come back for weekends.

title: (08370) Calella - N-II
description: Small rest area by the road, with splendid views. A little road noise. No camping, do not unpack anything, thank you!

title: (08370) Calella - 1 Zona Afores
description: Large, very flat sandy parking lot, 300 meters from the beach and 100 from the Calella lighthouse, with GR paths. And close to the population, camping is NOT allowed, be responsible with the environment, please, if they give us access, let's take care of it!

title: (08396) Sant Cebrià de Vallalta - Camí de Sant Cebrià de Vallalta
title_short: (08396) Sant Cebrià de Vallalta - Camí de Sant Cebrià de Vallalta
description: Area by the side of a forest track. Enough space for 2/3 small vans, easy access. More spaces along the rest of the track too. Nice and shaded under pines and strawberry trees

address.street: Camí de Sant Cebrià de Vallalta

title: (08394) Sant Vicenç de Montalt - 29 Passeig del Marques de Casa Riera
title_short: (08394) Sant Vicenç de Montalt - 29 Passeig del Marques de Casa Riera
description: Parking along the beach. Free off the season.

address.street: 29 Passeig del Marques de Casa Riera

title: (08396) Sant Cebrià de Vallalta - 48 Carrer Salt del Sallent
title_short: (08396) Sant Cebrià de Vallalta - 48 Carrer Salt del Sallent
description: Dirt track, no problem with a van, but don’t bring you big motor home. Not much traffic at night, and no one seemed to bother us being here.

title: (08370) Calella - 94 Carrer de Sant Jaume
description: Automatic launderette next to a petrol station.

title: (08370) Calella - 3 Carretera d'Hortsavinyà
description: Free unsupervised parking lot have taken the parking lot as a resting place for the market. Way to the beach approx. 1.5 km. Many cozy places between bamboo where you can stand. Motorhomes are not allowed other night there are lights and dark shaded areas with bamboo.

title: (08392) Sant Andreu de Llavaneres - 28 Carretera Nacional II
title_short: (08392) Sant Andreu de Llavaneres - 28 Carretera Nacional II
description:
Small parkinglot on a waste area, next to the road, opposite the harbour. 
Nice wiew over a small boats harbour and the sea,
near restaurants and bars in the harbour.  
no facilities available.

title: (08370) Pineda de Mar - 28 Carrer Lloret
description:
Small platform at the turn of the road, beautiful view of the sea and the city. Quiet and calm corner, little car traffic.
perfect for one night.

title: (08470) Can Palau - Unnamed Road
description: Very good mountain water. Not much water pressure, so you should not be in a hurry when filling up your drink water.

title: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 144 Carrer Llavaneres
description: Parking with beautiful views, we stopped here after looking for a quiet place. Be careful the climb is tough.

title: (08471) Vallgorguina - 72 Carretera Mataro
description: Free parking at the exit of the town of Vallgorguina. 5 seats. Water source. Picnic table. Next to the municipal soccer field. 100m from a calesthenics area. 300m from a spectacular trial area. 200m from a children's area. 100m from the health center. From there there is a 7km excursion to the dolmen.

title: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 23P Passeig de la Costa Brava
title_short: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 23P Passeig de la Costa Brava
description: Ample ground parking. Many parking lots, close to the center.

name: Camping Caballo de Mar
title: (08397) Camping Caballo de Mar
description:
Camping Caballo de Mar. It is not a large campsite but it has all the services of a large campsite without crowds. Loading and unloading of water. Beach 1 minute away and close to Calella and Pineda de Mar.
Swimming pool, water slides, children's pool, sports area and entertainment.

title: (08471) Vallgorguina - 20 Carretera Mataro
description: Free public parking in the same town but without streets, only the access one, surrounded by nature, with shops, bars and others at 100 m. Super quiet, ideal for excursions. The small population but with services.

name: Camping Bellsol
title: (08397) Camping Bellsol
description:
Pineda de Mar, 38 Passeig Maritim.
Campsite Bell Sol. short stopover in this campsite with our 2 young children. We were put towards the bottom, very quiet, medium sized parking spot. Big swimming pool, we don't have time for all activities. But all services available. the beach at 100 m. One downside, the traffic lanes are narrow, especially for turning... but with a good driver (motorhome 7 m long by 3 m high) and patience, you get to your destination!

title: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 89 Carrer Segrià
description: Place with a lot of space to park with vans with a view of the sea, shade and quiet

title: (08471) Vallgorguina - C-61
description: Free parking with picnic table, maximum 48 hours. near the stream

name: Camping El Camell
title: (08397) Camping El Camell
description: Family campsite, pleasant, very good reception and very friendly. They solve any problems you may have. Near the beach.

name: Camping BARCELONA
title: (08304) Camping BARCELONA
description: Camping Barcelona offers all the services of a top-of-the-range campsite. Private shuttle from the campsite to the center of Mataro (Barcelona) seven days a week. Ticket service for all the tourist attractions in the city. Camping Barcelona is located on the shores of the Mediterranean, with a magnificent view of the sea. Activities for adults and the swimming pool are practiced throughout the season. Most plots are very shaded and range from 60 to 140 square meters and are ideal for caravans of all sizes, even 15 meter American caravans. All plots have free high quality Wi-Fi, 10-16 amp electrical connection and almost all have a water point with drain. The entire campsite is suitable for people with reduced mobility. The bungalow park offers a range of very comfortable, fully equipped accommodation with free Wi-Fi.

title: (08470) Sant Celoni - Camí de Montnegre a Hortsavinyà
title_short: (08470) Sant Celoni - Camí de Montnegre a Hortsavinyà
description: Dirt road for 20 minutes but accessible by 4x4. A magnificent view and quiet. A lot of hiking to do.

title: (08319) Dosrius - Veinat del Far
description: Sanctuary located in full nature, in the heart of the "Parc Natural Corredor-Montnegre". It is accessed by a forest track in good condition and has ample parking. The restaurant is open on weekends all year and in summer every day. The month of July closed for holidays. Ideal for VAN's and small vehicle.

title: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 24P Lloc Sector PP1
title_short: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 24P Lloc Sector PP1
description: Very large free car park with no bans to date. No shade. A few steps from the sea and even if the railway line no noise. No service but very quiet. The pedestrian street is 600m away

name: Camping Enmar
title: (08397) Camping Enmar
description:
Camping enmar. Very good staff at the reception. Good pool, nice parcels but sometimes narrow paths. Small supermarket. Sanitary makes a clear impression. Not far from the beach. Open from 07/03/21 to 01/10/21 for next year 07/03/22 to 01/11/22
New: heated swimming pool during the months of low/mid season.

address.street: Avinguda Nuestra Señora de la Mercè

title: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 24 Carrer Tarragona
description:
Access only by online registration on our website.

Only for motorhomes.

Guarded area in the city center with all services (electricity, water, gray and black water, wifi, toilets and showers) 50m from the beach. Entrance of vehicles from 5 p.m. Reception: Monday to Saturday from 10 a.m. to 11 a.m. and from 5 p.m. to 7 p.m.

title: (08319) Dosrius - Veinat del Far
description: Picnic area. Ideal place to spend the day in full nature. There is a toilet and a cafeteria, but only open on weekends. It is prohibited to stay overnight.

title: (08471) Vallgorguina - Unnamed Road
description: Small parking in the nature reserve. Very quiet and secluded. In a few steps you are at a stone platform, from which you can wonderfully watch the sunset. The road is not fixed. With our van no problem, but I do not know if it is suitable for larger campers.

title: (08318) Dosrius - Camí del Pou de Glaç
title_short: (08318) Dosrius - Camí del Pou de Glaç
description: Large parking lot with easy access.

title: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 13 Carrer Alonso Cano
title_short: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 13 Carrer Alonso Cano
description: Located in the hills, great views of the city and the sea! At the top and at the bottom of a small residential area! Super quiet, the birds sing ... there are even mountain trails departures! Certainly inaccessible in high season! There can be 2/3 places for maximum vans.

title: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 39 Carrer Consolat de Mar
title_short: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 39 Carrer Consolat de Mar
description: Parking of Santa susana beach, wide limited to 2, 20 m

title: (08304) Mataró - 72 Carrer dels Remences
description: It is a car park in the Valverich industrial estate, but it does not have a gauge. it has good views. there is no limitation for AC.. it is very close to the c32 highway. easy access. away from the city center

title: (08398) Santa Susanna - N-II
description: Galp gas station with water

title: (08398) Santa Susanna - 5 Urbanitzacio Can Batlle
description: Public car park with around 25 spaces with trees in a residential area, flat terrain, without services.

title: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 39 Carrer Consolat de Mar
title_short: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 39 Carrer Consolat de Mar
description: Parking on the beach.  Just park for free.  There is a shower on the beach.

title: (08398) Santa Susanna - 37 Carrer del Bou
description: Parking next to a playground in the middle of nature.

title: (08398) Santa Susanna - 30 Carrer Salvador Espriu
description: Parking very shady at this time ATTENTION to the height but space wide enough to stand (3 m high for our ducato) point water front park for child. For night OK

title: (08470) Sant Celoni - Urbanitzacio de Cal Battle
title_short: (08470) Sant Celoni - Urbanitzacio de Cal Battle
description: watch out for bad roads and get very slippery when it rains

title: (08398) Santa Susanna - 28 Carrer Montagut
description: Dead end street, quiet, surrounded by a residential area. There is a church nearby and at 10pm bells were heard, I don't know if because of the curfew. At nine in the morning they rang again. Just at that time we left, it began to fill with cars, because there were some food stalls next to it. In the surroundings there are several openings all of land. There is the library and a few km a lidl and a carrefour.

title: (08398) Santa Susanna - Carrer de Joan Maragall
title_short: (08398) Santa Susanna - Carrer de Joan Maragall
description: Huge, relatively new free day and night parking space. No services though. Lidl nearby. Two minutes walk to restaurants and bars

name: Camping Oasis
title: (08398) Camping Oasis
description: “Camping Oasis” clean, secure, friendly people.  150 m walk to beach.  100 m walk to train station with service to Girona and Barcelona about 1 hour train ride.  Easy access for camper van. Not certain about larger vehicles. Lots of options of small houses. Looks like they may be expanding.

title: (08301) Mataró - Av. del Maresme
description: Parking along the railway line opposite the nautical center, possibility of spending the night without problem, no prohibition sign. On the other hand noisy by the passage of the trains. Access to the beach at 50m. Nice city to stay there for 1 day.

title: (08398) Barcelona - s/n Passeig Marítim
description: Beach front piece of land in between two hotels. Beach footpath along the sea front. This free car park is on the beach with patches of grass where motorhomes park without a problem. It is also used as a coach park for holiday coaches. Dogs not allowed on the beach but footpath nice & wide allowing good dog walking. No services just bins. There is a car park a short distance away that prohibits motorhomes overnight, this us clearly signposted, so don’t confuse the two. The police drive along the seafront, no interest in motorhomes only fining dogs on the beach.

title: (08470) Sant Celoni - 178 Urbanització Cal Batlle
description: Along a little frequented path, at the top of a climb, a small site for one or two motorhomes. Quiet, almost flat.

title: (08319) Dosrius -
description: Small parking lot in the middle of nature, very quiet place!

title: (08398) Santa Susanna - S/N Carrer dels Pins
title_short: (08398) Santa Susanna - S/N Carrer dels Pins
description: Beach Parking. No parking from 8 p.m. to 9 a.m.

title: (08302) Mataró - 100 Passeig del Callao
description: Drinking water fountain 5m from the car park between the road and Mataró beach. Perfect for filling jerry cans. Easy access for a van or a motorhome if there is room.

name: Càmping El Pinar Platja
title: (08398) Càmping El Pinar Platja
description: At the beach!

title: (08398) Santa Susanna - 66 Camí del Mig
description: Parking reserved for motorhomes

title: (08470) San Celoni - 109 E-15
description: Parking defined as such next to the highway. The rest is green and next to the mountain. Little protected from the wind and calm. Starting point of several mountain routes. Easy access.

name: Càmping Bon Repòs
title: (08398) Càmping Bon Repòs
description: The place borders directly on the sea. A railway line to Barcelona runs between the campsite and the village. A pool and children's activities are available. There is a restaurant and a small supermarket on the square. Fresh baguettes in the morning and many everyday items on offer. There are other supermarkets in the nearby town. There is a large old pine forest with shaded pitches as well as sunny pitches closer to the beach. The subsoil is compacted gravel. No height limit. Suitable for mobile homes up to 10 m. Spanish, English and German are spoken at the reception. The electricity is free. 10 A are supplied.

title: (08304) Mataró - 17 Carrer Riu Ebre
description: Parking under the viewpoint of the Mataró forest park. The viewpoint has better views but it is very crowded and this parking lot is much quieter and has 2 levels. no parking from 10pm to 7am. Then in the morning you can go up to see the viewpoint and there are tables for breakfast with good views.

title: (08398) Santa Susanna - 22 Carrer del Pla de la Torre
title_short: (08398) Santa Susanna - 22 Carrer del Pla de la Torre
description: Ground parking, you can park day and night, only parking vehicles above 3500 Kg and buses are prohibited.

address.street: 22 Carrer del Pla de la Torre

title: (08304) Mataró - 30 Carrer del Cami de la Cornisa
title_short: (08304) Mataró - 30 Carrer del Cami de la Cornisa
description: Ascent to a parking lot with exceptional views of the city of Mataró and the port, suitable for all vehicles. Maximum length 8m. About 20 places to park. There are rubbish bins, tables and some route through the area.

address.street: 30 Carrer del Cami de la Cornisa

title: (08470) San Celoni - 282 Carrer Comerc
description: New 7-seater motorhome area. Next door there is more parking. There is enough to empty the gray water and you can load water. All services in less than 5 minutes, the train station to go to Barcelona (45 km), 2 minutes to the center of Sant Celoni, petrol stations, supermarkets. The train line Barcelona-Girona is right next door, some goods can circulate at night. 100x100 recommended.

title: (08398) Santa Susanna - 5 Carrer Marina
description:
Has no services, to spend the night.
5 min from the beach and shopping area.
There is a prohibition sign in all of Santa Susana but if you notify the local police they will tell you where

title: (08460) Can Bosc -
description: Repsol with LPG

title: (08470) Sant Celoni - Plaça Sector Cementeri
description: Shared parking at the LIDL supermarket and Burguer King. There is also a furniture and household goods store. Large, bright, there is WIFI in the Burger King. You can park day and night

title: (08302) Mataró - 129 Avinguda del Maresme
description: Parking during the day, you cannot spend the night. Only 100 meters away there is a sandy beach for people and another small fenced beach for dogs. The first hour is free (2 hours in winter). Until you get there, you pass the train tracks through a 5 meter high tunnel. To walk into the city, you have to take the underground next to the station (beautiful old building in red) under the trains.

title: (08470) Sant Celoni - 30 Carrer Campins
description: Washers and dryers to clean and dry clothes

title: (08470) Sant Celoni - 67 Carrer de Jaume I
title_short: (08470) Sant Celoni - 67 Carrer de Jaume I
description: Condis supermarket car park

title: (08470) San Celoni - Autopista del Mediterráneo
description: Small place with trees and 4 places for picnic.

title: (08302) Mataró - 13 Carrer Joan Larrea
description: Self-service laundry. 3 dryers of 15min. Around there are supermarkets, bank, pharmacy

title: (08460) Santa Maria de Palautordera - 37 Camí Vell de Sant Celoni
title_short: (08460) Santa Maria de Palautordera - 37 Camí Vell de Sant Celoni
description: Self-service laundry with good area to park large vehicles

title: (08470) -
description: Quiet place despite the rails which are quite close, but at night there is little passage of trains. A few walkers during the day, surrounded by fields and forest therefore for ideal hiking departures. Recommended for one night, but no more. Little more, the place is easily accessible by motorhome and above all it is flat.

title: (08450) Llinars del Vallès - 76 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Parking of the Church of Collsabadell, very quiet, source of drinking water, ideal for walking routes to the Montse Negra Corredor natural park,

title: (08302) Mataró - 80 Carrer Pablo Iglesias
description: Tree-lined street with shade and many parking spaces, some completely flat. It is located next to the soccer field near the Mossos de Escuadra police station and at the end of the Can Boada polygon. A few meters away we find the Roman site of Torre Llaurader. It is a quiet area with many trees and parks to walk the dog. It is close to the residential area with supermarkets, bars, etc, and about 500m from the beach. At night there is always parking. I don't recommend weekends because they come to have a bottle.

title: (08302) Mataró - Passeig de Marina
description: Parking possible along the sidewalks on either side of the street where, alone, the railway line separates us from the sea. Many trains during the day but not at night. Had a quiet night. The police passed last night without stopping.

title: (08380) Malgrat de Mar - 25 Barri Palomeres
description: picnic area

title: (08380) Malgrat de Mar - 9 Carrer de Roger de Flor
title_short: (08380) Malgrat de Mar - 9 Carrer de Roger de Flor
description: Free parking and overnight stay on car park. Would only suggest staying for one night as it is frequently patrolled and monitored by local police. Very close to beach, bars and restaurants.

title: (08303) Mataró - 284 Avinguda de Puig i Cadafalch
title_short: (08303) Mataró - 284 Avinguda de Puig i Cadafalch
description: D’ara gas station with Lpg

title: (08450) Llinars del Vallès - Autopista del Mediterráneo
title_short: (08450) Llinars del Vallès - Autopista del Mediterráneo
description: AP-7 service area for emptying and free filling.

title: (08450) Collsabadell - 59 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Picnic area by the highway, with shaded parking spaces (2.1m)

title: (08303) Mataró - 39 Carrera d'Argentona
description: Land parking without services, large parking area

title: (08450) - 54 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Service area in AP-7 for free emptying and filling. Barcelona address.

title: (08460) Santa Maria de Palautordera - 7 Passatge Lleget

title: (08302) Mataró - 185 Passeig de Marina
description:
Streets on both sides (in both directions) are called Passeig del Rengle. They are streets with online parking spots. Plenty of space, few cars, and if you park on the side of the trees there is shade.

Right in front there is a viewpoint in which there is also a fountain and a free public bathroom with water and soap to wash hands (or not very large dishes).
There is also a playground beyond and a park for exercises such as bicycles and others, especially for the elderly.

At night it's quiet, during the day some people walk by (not many) and cars pass or park but there aren't many or bother.

title: (08319) Dosrius - 9 B-510
description: Public parking next to the village. Very calm. Supermarket 2 min.

title: (08450) Llinars del Vallès - 90 Diseminado Diseminados
description: We spent two days very well and calm. They are the facilities of the Mogent colony house and they are very good. There is drinking water, showers, toilets, a small playground for the children and picnic tables. They can also access motorhomes. Children under 13 years old do not pay. From the 3rd person over 12 years old, they pay. Very friendly owners. They told us that soon they want to put gray and black water drainage, at the moment they do not have. For the electricity you pay separately. To go you have to book. They have WhatsApp. Since June 2021 they already have for gray and black water!

title: (08450) Llinars del Vallès - Unnamed Road

name: AREA CAMPER BARCELONA BEACH
title: (08349) AREA CAMPER BARCELONA BEACH
description: BARCELONA BEACH CAMPER AREA - New area for motorhomes in Cabrera de Mar, 10 minutes on foot from the train station to Barcelona (trains every 10 minutes, journey time 40 minutes) and 490 meters from the beach and a shopping centre. Located in a privileged environment, it offers all the services: minimarket, cafeteria, picnic area, gray and black water emptying, water filling, washing machine, dryer and hot water shower. Possibility of only changing water for non-customers. Between the sea and the mountains, from the area you can get to Barcelona by bike (60 minutes) along the promenade, next to the beach, and you can practice water sports, hiking, mountain biking and guided visits to archaeological sites.

title: (08490) Tordera - Carrer Estacio
description: The Motorhome area in Tordera, is located just 5 minutes walk from the town center, has almost all the services, it is also surrounded by nature, right next to a park so that the little ones can enjoy nature, in addition It has a barbecue area and community pool for the summer, on Sundays they have a market and it is very large. There is also a community scale in case you want to weigh the air conditioner. At least for our huge SAT system, it is not possible to find an Astra satellite because of the trees. Internet is almost impossible in this area. Driving cars throw up a lot of dust. We are disappointed with the supply and disposal facility. It is not accessible for large motorhomes with a storage tank.

title: (08461) Sant Esteve de Palautordera - Carrer Francesc Macià
title_short: (08461) Sant Esteve de Palautordera - Carrer Francesc Macià

There is no height limit

There are large spaces for trucks or buses in case you go with a large motorhome

Mercadona less than 5min and laundry less than 7

Camping Voramar.

the staff very friendly.

description: Campsite Bella Terra with large, delimited pitches, quiet and above all with sanitary facilities as we do not often see (this is even the first time that we have seen such clean and functional, even in France). To recommend with eyes closed. Be careful when arriving, the main access is on the left.

title: (08340) Vilassar de Mar - 48 Carrer de Sant Josep
title_short: (08340) Vilassar de Mar - 48 Carrer de Sant Josep

title: (17300) Càmping Blanes
description: Small campsite in an idyllic location right by the sea. Very spacious parking spaces under trees. It becomes difficult for long vehicles, as we have seen. Direct beach access with code. Located at the end of the beach promenade. Small shop and snack bar on the square. The place with shops can be reached on foot.

title: (08317) Òrrius - Carretera Cabrils a Òrrius
description: Quiet and flat in the middle of a pine forest. several locations available. Small view through the trees on the city against low. no water point.

title: (17452) Massanes - 17 Carrer Josep Pla
description: Undeveloped industrial zone. Not nice but ok for one night. Quiet impasse.

title: (08340) Vilassar de Mar - 1 Carrer Marina
description: A quiet open space where the neighbors park, large, and quite safe, much quieter and safer than those on the beach. It has nothing, not even a container to throw away the garbage.

name: Càmping Solmar
title: (17300) Càmping Solmar
description: Blanes, 48 ​​Carrer Cristòfor Colom. Camping Solmar, not suitable for motorhomes, no service area. No tap water, no dedicated drain. 300 meters from the beaches, close to shops (exit of the campsite), swimming pool, wifi (paying). Sanitary very clean and cleaned very regularly. I think this campsite, probably very good elsewhere, has no place in an application dedicated to motorhomes. In addition, locations too narrow.

name: Camping Cavall de Mar
title: (17300) Camping Cavall de Mar
description: It is the Camping Cavall de Mar and it is small and very quiet

title: (08317) Argentona - 22 Carrer Aquença
description: Small car park for about 6 vans on the roadside. Quiet place, I spent the night alone and without any disturbance. From 9 o'clock the cyclists and the odd car start. Little crowded area.

title: (08495) Fogars de la Selva - 1 Casa Nova Planas
title_short: (08495) Fogars de la Selva - 1 Casa Nova Planas
description: Picnic area with tables next to a church. There is a bicycle lane called the Tourdera.

title: (17300) Blanes - 40 Passeig de s'Abanell
description: Parking on the beach, free from September to June! No supply and disposal, but garbage cans nearby. Parking spaces all the way down the street. Stay clean!

name: Camping LaMasia
title: (17300) Camping LaMasia
description: Camping LaMasia very expensive limited pitch, I have an 8 meter motorhome he put on a 7 meter pitch I put myself through, so it was not possible to put my awning on, in the evening I wanted to take a shower!

name: Montseny Campers' Association (AAM)
title: (08458) Montseny Campers' Association (AAM)
description:
ONLY BOOKINGS 1 HOUR IN ADVANCE. Entry is not possible or permitted without a reservation. ⚠️ Contact via email or WhatsApp recommended. Telephone also possible. Albert replies quickly!

The contribution is 100% intended for the conservation of the flora and fauna of the site and for the promotion of the natural environment in which you are staying, the "Biosphere Reserve of Montseny".

Services: All services are very good and well maintained.

Security: The site is under video surveillance and can only be accessed via an entrance gate with a code. (Albert knows you're there before you set up your camper.)

Registration: You ask for the desired period. Then you get all the information, e.g. via WhatsApp. Then he only needs the information about which vehicle you are driving (easiest: a picture of the vehicle with a recognizable license plate via WhatsApp).

BE SURE TO USE GPS COORDINATES!
Thanks very much!

title: (17300) Blanes - 1 Plaça Badajoz
description: Water point next to the play area, I don't know if it is totally drinkable

title: (08440) Barcelona - 61 Carrer Orfeó Català
description: On the outskirts of Cardedeu, there is always a place to park, it feels safe, Mercadona close by

name: Càmping S'Abanell
title: (17300) Càmping S'Abanell
description: Camping s'abanell, a bit noisy, but they still have some places when the other campsites are full. Good for a few nights. 2 steps from the sea and the city center

title: (17452) Massanes - Carrer Pi
description: I live in the area and I see many motorhomes that park and spend a night. It pretended to be an industrial estate but there is only one for companies. space to maneuver some shadows ... although the trees are small. no services 20 minutes from the beach .. Blanes 30 min from the mountain ... Montseny

description: Public free parking 15 minutes walk from the beach, very noisy in July during the carnival.

title_short: (08458) Sant Pere de Vilamajor - 6 Carrer Dalia

title: (08340) Vilassar de Mar - 71 Cases de Camp
title_short: (08340) Vilassar de Mar - 71 Cases de Camp
description: Space for motorhomes and campers on a private property in Vilassar de Mar, without services, with the door open, come in and ask, Jaume/James or Estela will appear at some point or be during the day from 10 a.m. to 8 p.m. in the afternoon. €10 per night. From 8:30 pm to 8:30 am closed for vehicles without prior notice. How to get there: from the side of the sea towards the mountains, NOT from the side of the mountains, (follow the orange triangle, until the hipica) all the way to the right.

title: (17300) Blanes - 19 Carrer d'Antoni Gaudí
description: Nice free location close to beach and town. nice restaurants and shops. beautiful boulevard 5 minutes walk. no services but 11 official motorhome pitches, but there are more in the surrounding large parking lot.
